name: Green Faith Acolyte
text: You have trained to channel your magical energies in ways that do not harm the natural world around you.
benefit: Spells you cast that deal damage, channel negative energy, or otherwise harm life do not hurt normal or magical plants. In addition, whenever you cast a spell that utilizes, heals, or enhances normal or magical plants (such as entangle or plant growth), you cast the spell at +1 caster level.
text_zh: 经过修行，你可以以不会伤害自然环境的方式引导你的法术能量。
prerequisites_zh: 苍翠誓约的成员（Follower of the Green Faith）。
benefit_zh: 你所施展的任何造成伤害、引导负能量或以其他能够伤害活物的方式不会再伤害到普通或魔法创造的植物。此外，当你施展那些操纵、治疗、或强化那些植物的法术（比如纠缠术entangle或植物滋长plant growth）时，你的施法者等级提高1级。
